techniqueRules: Build broth and jang depth first.
Balance heat with umami and sweetness.
Serve with rice and side components when possible.
substitutions: No gochugaru -> mild chili flakes + paprika
No sesame oil -> neutral oil + toasted sesame
donts: Avoid over-thick sauces for soup dishes

snippets.text: Korean home comfort should be broth-rich, savory, and rice-centered.
Weeknight Korean profile should prioritize jjigae or stir-fry + rice with banchan logic.
Korean cues include kimchi, jang seasoning, and garlic-scallion aromatics.
